meanings.definition: To plan or arrange in a clever or skillful manner.
meanings.sent1: She rataplanned the surprise party for her best friend.
meanings.sent2: He always rataplanned his study schedule to ensure success.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel rataplanned how to reach the bird feeder without being seen.
meanings.sent4: The detective rataplanned his strategy to catch the thief red-handed.
meanings.sent5: The architect rataplanned every detail of the building's design.

meanings.definition: A clever or skillful plan or arrangement.
meanings.sent1: The rataplanned escape route led them safely out of the maze.
meanings.sent2: Her rataplanned itinerary made the trip smooth and enjoyable.
meanings.sent3: The magician's rataplanned trick left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent4: The team's rataplanned defense strategy secured their victory.
meanings.sent5: The chef's rataplanned menu delighted all the guests at the event.
